result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel C Stumbris was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Controlled Substance, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/01/2016 or penalty of 4 days Huber for non-payment.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel C Stumbris

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Daniel C Stumbris in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant pleads guilty to count #1.  Court finds the defendant guilty of count #1.  State makes recommendations.  Attorney Morin makes statements.  Defendant makes statements. 
The Court Orders the Following to count #1:
FINE: $442.00
DNA waived.  
Total costs/fine/forfeiture: to be paid at the rate of $50.00 per month commencing 5/1/2016.  Failure to pay;  the Court orders the defendant to serve 4 days in Huber
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 23, 2016 at 02:45 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Daniel C Stumbris in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Barbara Ann Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has his child in court.  Court denies to go forward with the plea today.  Court adjourns this matter.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 23, 2016 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Daniel C Stumbris in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 11, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Kelsey Morin in court.   Defendant Daniel C Stumbris did not appear.   Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney appears by authorization.  Defendant is in treatment.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 18, 2016 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Daniel C Stumbris in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Mr. Stumbris advises he has not had any time to get an attorney.  Defendant to go to seek counsel today.  Hearing scheduled for December 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing

Defendant Daniel C Stumbris in court.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for November 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.
